title: Scientific Reasoning Enhancement Program Using Inquiry-Based Illustrated Storybooks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of social science phenomena and experience with simple experimental observations
context.additional_context: Environment emphasizing student-centered activities through parallel use of digital devices and inquiry-based illustrated storybooks

learning_goals: Students can systematically analyze clues in picture books and establish hypotheses to solve scientific problems.
Learners can visualize and express logical reasoning processes based on data collected during inquiry activities.
Learners can creatively present scientific reasoning results through collaboration with peers during project execution.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
